verses.text: And there was a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and of their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* against their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

For there \w were|strong="H3426"\w* that \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We, our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \add are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: therefore we take \w up|strong="H3947"\w* \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* \add for them\add*, that we may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\add Some\add* also there \w were|strong="H3426"\w* that \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w mortgaged|strong="H6148"\w* our \w lands|strong="H7704"\w*, \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, that we might \w buy|strong="H3947"\w* \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, because of the \w dearth|strong="H7458"\w*.

There \w were|strong="H3426"\w* also that \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w borrowed|strong="H3867"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4060"\w*, \add and that upon\add* our \w lands|strong="H7704"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*.

Yet now our \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add is\add* as the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, our \w children|strong="H1121"\w* as their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: and, lo, we bring into \w bondage|strong="H3533"\w* our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to be \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \add some\add* of our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w are|strong="H3426"\w* brought unto \w bondage|strong="H3533"\w* \add already:\add* neither \add is it\add* in our \w power|strong="H0410"\w* \add to redeem them;\add* for other \w men|strong="H0312"\w* have our \w lands|strong="H7704"\w* and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*.
¶ And I was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* when I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* their \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* and these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then I \w consulted|strong="H4427"\w* with \w myself|strong="H3820"\w*, and I \w rebuked|strong="H7378"\w* the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w*, and the \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye \w exact|strong="H5378"\w* \w usury|strong="H4855"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*. And I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6952"\w* against them.\f + \fr 5.7 \ft I consulted…: Heb. my heart consulted in me\f*

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, We after our \w ability|strong="H1767"\w* have \w redeemed|strong="H7069"\w* our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, which were \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* unto the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; and will ye even \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*? or shall they be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* unto us? Then held they their \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \add to answer\add*.

Also I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: ought ye not to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* because of the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*?

I likewise, \add and\add* my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and my \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, might \w exact|strong="H5383"\w* of them \w money|strong="H3701"\w* and \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*: I pray you, let us leave \w off|strong="H5800"\w* this \w usury|strong="H4855"\w*.

\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w*, I pray you, to them, even this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, their \w lands|strong="H7704"\w*, their \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, their \w oliveyards|strong="H2132"\w*, and their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, also the \w hundredth|strong="H3967"\w* \add part\add* of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, and of the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, the \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, that ye \w exact|strong="H5383"\w* of them.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they, We will \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \add them\add*, and will \w require|strong="H1245"\w* nothing of them; so will we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*. Then I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and took an \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* of them, that they should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to this \w promise|strong="H1697"\w*.

Also I \w shook|strong="H5287"\w* my \w lap|strong="H2684"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, So \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shake \w out|strong="H5287"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and from his \w labour|strong="H3018"\w*, that \w performeth|strong="H6965"\w* not this \w promise|strong="H1697"\w*, even thus be he shaken \w out|strong="H5287"\w*, and \w emptied|strong="H7386"\w*. And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, and \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to this \w promise|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft emptied: Heb. empty, or, void\f*

¶ Moreover from the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that I was \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* to be their \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, from the \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* even unto the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w thirtieth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \add that is\add*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, I and my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* have not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of the \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*.

But the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* that \add had been\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me were \w chargeable|strong="H3513"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* of them \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w beside|strong="H0310"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; yea, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* their \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* bare \w rule|strong="H7980"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: but so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* not I, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Yea, also I \w continued|strong="H2388"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of this \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, neither \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* we any \w land|strong="H7704"\w*: and all my \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \add were\add* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* thither unto the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

Moreover \add there were\add* at my \w table|strong="H7979"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, beside those that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto us from among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* about \w us|strong="H5439"\w*.

Now \add that\add* which was \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \add for me\add* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \add and\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w choice|strong="H1305"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*; also \w fowls|strong="H6833"\w* were \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* for me, and once in \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w store|strong="H7235"\w* of all sorts of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: yet for \w all|strong="H5973"\w* this \w required|strong="H1245"\w* not I the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of the \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*, because the \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w* was \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* upon this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
\w Think|strong="H2142"\w* upon me, my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \add according\add* to all that I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
